summary: The Financial Report of the U.S. Government provides a comprehensive view of government finances, including revenues, costs, assets, liabilities, and long-term sustainability. We audit the financial statements in that report each year, but we haven't yet been able to determine if they are fairly presented. title: Financial Audit: FY 2024 and FY 2023 Consolidated Financial Statements of the U.S. Government
